text: aur agar yah log taurait aur injeel aur (saheefe) unake paas unake paravaradigaar kee taraf se naazil kiye gae the (unake ehakaam ko) qaayam rakhate to zaroor (unake) oopar se bhee (rizaq baras padata) aur povon ke neeche se bhee ubal aata aur (ye khoob chain se) khaate unamen se kuchh log to etadaal par hain (magar) unamen se bahutere jo kuchh karate hain bura hee karate hain
